name: Turn Base Based Game
description:
Units:
- Tanks,

- Air Defense Systems

- Aircraft

Base is special unit you need to defend.
Base power is only currency.
Buying units spends base power, when power is 0 you lose, use it wisely.

Every turn movement points and ammo are refreshed.
Units will defend if attacked and have ammo. When unit is attacked multiple times in one turn it defends itself only first time.

Good luck!
